Package primitives

Class Vector

java.lang.Object
primitives.Triple
primitives.VectorBase
primitives.Vector
Direct Known Subclasses:
NormalizedVector
public class Vector
extends VectorBase
The Vector class represents a Vector with it's base at the origin and it's head at the Point 'head'.

  • Constructor Details

    • Vector

      public Vector​(double x, double y, double z)
      This constructor accepts 3 doubles and returns the appropriate Vector
      Parameters:
      x - The value of the x coordinate.
      y - The value of the y coordinate.
      z - The value of the z coordinate.
      Throws:
      ZeroVectorException - if the Vector is the zero vector.

  • Method Details

    • add

      public Vector add​(Triple triple)
      Adds two Vectors and returns a new Vector.
      Overrides:
      add in class VectorBase
      Parameters:
      triple - The Triple which is to be added to this Vector.
      Returns:
      The sum of the two Vectors.
      Throws:
      ZeroVectorException - when adding a Vector with its reverse.

    • subtract

      public Vector subtract​(VectorBase vector)
      Subtracts two Vectors and returns a new Vector.
      Overrides:
      subtract in class VectorBase
      Parameters:
      vector - The VectorBase to be subtracted from this Vector.
      Returns:
      The sum of this Vector and the negation of the given VectorBase.
      Throws:
      ZeroVectorException - if a Vector is subtracted from itself.

    • scale

      public Vector scale​(double factor)
      Constructs a new Vector which is a scalar multiplication of this Vector by a scalar.
      Overrides:
      scale in class VectorBase
      Parameters:
      factor - The scalar by which to multiply this Vector
      Returns:
      New scaled Vector
      Throws:
      ZeroVectorException - if the scale factor is zero.

    • cross

      public Vector cross​(Vector vector)
      Calculates the cross product of two Vectors.
      Parameters:
      vector - The Vector by which to multiply this Vector
      Returns:
      The resulting Vector which is the cross product of the two Vectors
      Throws:
      ZeroVectorException - if the result vector is the zero vector.

    • normalized

      public NormalizedVector normalized()
      Creates a new Vector with the same direction as this one but with a magnitude of one.
      Returns:
      new Vector

    • angle

      public double angle​(Vector v)
      Calculates the angle in radians between this vector and the given vector. The angle is normalized between zero and Pi.
      Parameters:
      v - The other vector to be used to calculate the angle.
      Returns:
      The angle in radians between the vectors between zero and Pi.

    • reversed

      public Vector reversed()
      Description copied from class: VectorBase
      An alias for VectorBase.scale(double) with factor -1.
      Overrides:
      reversed in class VectorBase
      Returns:
      New reversed VectorBase
